invocations.description: Will try to reach the creature with name creaturename. Optionally you can set a distance to keep from the creature given.
invocations.exDescription: Will try to reach the creature named 'Dove', then say 'hi' and wait a while for the NPC Channel to open, and say 'trade'.

invocations.description: Will try to reach the creature with id creatureid. Optionally you can set a distance to keep from the creature given.
